response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense potential impact, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $900,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. Should you decide to proceed, we can arrange for a personalized consultation to discuss how this product can be seamlessly integrated into your existing systems and processes. I look forward to your consideration and hope to contribute to your continued success.", "product_price": 900000}
